name: John Regress
description:
John Regress is only choice when you want to discover truth about your past lifes. If you not... well, it's your problem, if you do it's also your problem of course. John is the best PLR (past life regression) therapist in the world.

Controls

Arrows - move left/right

Space - action button

Credits

Code and graphic assets was made by me, sounds I found on FreeSound.
